nodes.title: d3
nodes.description: Mini projects that I had to finish on my own using D3.js in order to be awarded the Data Visualisation Certification

projects.title: USA GDP
projects.shortDescription: A bar chart D3.js visualisation of the USA GDP over the years.

projects.title: Doping in Cycling
projects.shortDescription: A scatter plot D3.js visualisation of doping in professional bicycle racing.

projects.title: Land Surface Temperature
projects.shortDescription: A D3.js heat map of land-surface temperatures over the years.

projects.title: USA Higher Education
projects.shortDescription: A D3.js choropleth of United States higher educational attainment.

nodes.title: react
nodes.description: Small apps that I had to develop on my own in order to be awarded the Front End Libraries Certification. My library of choice was React

projects.title: Random Quote Machine
projects.shortDescription: Provides the user with a random famous quote ready to be shared on Twitter.

projects.title: Markdown Previewer
projects.shortDescription: Renders GitHub flavored markdown into HTML.

projects.title: Drum Machine
projects.shortDescription: Plays a different short sound on drum pad clicks.

projects.title: Pomodoro Clock
projects.shortDescription: Lets you set work-session and break lengths and notifies you when the time's up.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.shortDescription: A Javascript calculator.

nodes.title: backend
nodes.description:
Some of the projects that I had to finish in order to get the APIs and Microservices
 Certification

projects.title: Sudoku Solver
projects.shortDescription: Checks validity of a cell against the current state of the board. Calculates the final solution.

projects.title: Personal Library
projects.shortDescription: A small personal library for books and commentary on them.
